channel.title: Cook'n With Copilot
channel.description: A blog series offering GitHub Copilot tips, tricks, and code recipes to help developers build smarter and faster.

item.title: Write Cleaner Code Comments with GitHub Copilot
item.description: Learn how to use GitHub Copilot to write better, more meaningful code comments that improve code readability and maintainability.

item.title: Use GitHub Copilot Chat to Plan Before You Code
item.description: Discover how GitHub Copilot Chat can help you plan and structure your code before you start writing, leading to better architecture and cleaner implementation.

item.title: Copilot vs. Chat: Sidekick Showdown
item.description: Compare GitHub Copilot and GitHub Copilot Chat to understand when to use each tool for maximum productivity and better code quality.

item.title: Avoid These Common Prompts
item.description: Learn about common GitHub Copilot prompts that don't work well and discover better alternatives that will give you more useful results.

item.title: Top 10 Copilot Tips
item.description: A curated list of the most effective GitHub Copilot tips and tricks to supercharge your coding workflow and productivity.

item.title: Refactor Messy Code in Seconds with GitHub Copilot
item.description: Transform legacy and messy code into clean, maintainable solutions using GitHub Copilot's powerful refactoring capabilities.

item.title: Automate Repetitive Code with GitHub Copilot
item.description: Eliminate tedious, repetitive coding tasks by leveraging GitHub Copilot's pattern recognition and code generation capabilities.

item.title: Ways to Use GitHub Copilot for Documentation & Clarity
item.description: Improve your code documentation and clarity using GitHub Copilot to generate comprehensive comments, README files, and inline documentation.

item.title: Debug Faster with GitHub Copilot
item.description: Speed up your debugging process by using GitHub Copilot to identify issues, suggest fixes, and write effective debug code.

item.title: Use Copilot in VS Code to Summarize PRs
item.description: Learn how to leverage GitHub Copilot in VS Code to create comprehensive and meaningful pull request summaries and descriptions.
